root.name: Major Stryker
root.description: Major Stryker is a top-down shooter developed and published by Apogee. It follows the adventures of Major Harrison Stryker, a hero of the third world war. He is called on to fight against the Kretons, evil alien invaders. The game has three difficulties and three different worlds to play. The game is available as freeware from 3D Realms.
